NOTE: NOT RECOMMENDED TO USE THE EXTRA DASHBOARD PAD FOR WINDSHIELD MOUNTING
Broad Vision: Qifutan cell phone car mount features a 16cm/6.2in aluminum long gooseneck that sends your phone much closer to you. It can be mounted on the dashboard or windshield firmly. Most importantly, you can bend it in every direction to avoid obstructing the view
Secure Steady Installation: Qifutan car mount for iphone 13/12/11 features an extra-strong vacuum suction cup with a layer of super sticky gel, a locking lever, and an anti-shake stabilizer. It sticks securely and easily on the dashboard or most flat surfaces and removes the phone car mount without leaving any nasty marks. (Note: use warm water to wash the car holder’s suction cup if the surface is dirty or it can not stick firmly, then let it air dry.)
One-Hand Operation: Press the button on the lower back of the car mobile phone holder to take out your phone, and press the back edge of the clamping arms to secure your phone with one hand. Make your operation more fluently. Fit well for the smartphone which’s the width between 4”-7”in and the most thickness
Smooth Contact: The car phone mount is padded with multiple soft silicone pads to avoid scratching your smartphone or other devices. Perfect choice for most cars, vehicle, pickup trucks, SUVs, trucks, taxis; a good assistant for Uber, Lyft drivers
Ideal Viewing Angle: The car phone mount features a 360° rotating ball joint that allows you to switch it from portrait to landscape view quickly, for getting the best viewing angle. It is favorable for navigation and sending and receiving phone calls. You can enjoy a more convenient and secure drive

Material Type: Aluminum alloy

ZAYAD Reacher grabber USES the premium aluminum alloy materials, you can pick up 3 pounds, don’t worry about
grabber could break,it has a very comfortable handle and a rubber chuck, You can pick up small
objects in red wine glasses and crevices.

After surgery patients or elderly, act not convenient, don’t need to bend over you can pickup
the garbage in the garden, protection from already of lumbar spine, for children, it does
not need to stand on a table or on the steps, you can easily get high objects.

Use it for:
Picking up trash and litter.
Picking up broken glass pieces.
Reaching under furniture and beds.
Retrieving items in hard to reach cabinets.
Picking up daily things such as the newspaper.
Plus many many more uses.

How to Use
1. The arrow on the plastic part of the folding place is aimed at the groove on the aluminum alloy pole.
2. The aluminum alloy chuck is inserted into the hole in the plastic part.
3. Pull the handle switch, clamp the head to close, loosen the switch, clip the head to loosen.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

The FRAM Fresh Breeze cabin air filter is the only cabin air filter that uses the natural deodorizing properties of ARM & HAMMER baking soda and activated carbon embedded in the filter. FRAM recommends changing your cabin air filter every 12,000 miles.
VEHICLE APPLICATIONS: HONDA ACCORD; 2006-2015 HONDA CIVIC; 2012-2015 HONDA CROSSTOUR; 2007-2016 HONDA CR-V; 2005-2017 HONDA ODYSSEY; 2019-2022 HONDA PASSPORT; 2009-2022 HONDA PILOT; 2006-2014,2017-2022 HONDA RIDGELINE
VEHICLE APPICATIONS CONT: 2007-2011 ACURA CSX; 2013-2022 ACURA ILX; 2007-2020 ACURA MDX; 2007-2018 ACURA RDX; 2005-2012 ACURA RL; 2014-2020 ACURA RLX; 2004-2014 ACURA TL; 2015-2020 ACURA TLX; 2004-2014 ACURA TSX; 2010-2013 ACURA ZDX; 2003-2022
FILTER CROSS REFERENCES: BOSCH P3875WS; Honda (80219-SHJ-A01, 80292-SDA-407, 80292-SDA-A01); K&N VF2001; Purolator C35519
EASY INSTALL: This cabin air filter is located behind the glove box and on average will only take 15 minutes to replace the old filter with a new filter
FRAM Fresh Breeze cabin air filters are the only cabin filter built with Arm & Hammer baking soda combined with carbon embedded in the filter helping to take out and odors that enter your vehicle through the ventilation system

item.title: ARM & HAMMER Swivel Bin & Rake Pooper Scooper
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) DOG POOPER SCOOPER WITH ADJUSTABLE HANDLE: The lightweight handle extends up to 32 inches, which prevents the need to bend, kneel or squat to pick up pet waste. No more breaking your back to bend down and scoop up dog poop with your hand and dog poop bag. Rake and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:49:29 UTC – Details)



DOG POOPER SCOOPER WITH ADJUSTABLE HANDLE: The lightweight handle extends up to 32 inches, which prevents the need to bend, kneel or squat to pick up pet waste. No more breaking your back to bend down and scoop up dog poop with your hand and dog poop bag. Rake and then lift the pan to contain waste.
NEXT LEVEL QUALITY: Arm and Hammer waste bags help keep your bin clean and provide natural odor control with activated baking soda.2x thicker than standard grocery bags and helps contain large quantities of pet waste. Less messy than a broom and dustpan set, perfect for your dog housebreaking supplies.
HEAVY DUTY BAGS: These poop bags are two times thicker than standard grocery bags. Fresh Scent along with activated baking soda help to neutralize foul odors while you work. The handle ties prevent touching the waste and keeps stink in while you are taking the dog poop bag out.
ARM & HAMMER, ODOR CONTROL YOU CAN TRUST: From waste bag dispensers and litter box wipes to litter pans, liners, scoops, and pet beds, Arm & Hammer has you and your pet covered with mess-fighting solutions that people know and trust. Refill bags are available for purchase separately.
HOW TO USE BAGS: Pull a single bag from the perforated section on the side of the package. Loop bag handles around molded hooks on side of the bin. When finished scooping, unhook bag handles, tie with easy-tie handles and dispose of properly. Questions or complaints, contact us as we are happy to help.

Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:49:29 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:26:06 UTC – Details)

Product Description

【2022 Upgrade Stable Tablet Stand】 Made of Heavy duty aluminum-magnesium alloy solid cord , stiffened material, very sturdy and flexible. 30 inches (76 CM) Overall Length from bottom to top. Moreover, compared to most of the tablet stands on the market, our tablet holder is upgraded, the bottom is additionally reinforced to ensure its maximum stability. Make it strong and sturdy to protect your cellphone and tablet.
【Broad Compatibility】 VIVI MAO tablet holder has a wide range of compatibility, suitable for almost all 4.7-12.9 inch devices on the market, such as iPad mini 2 3 4 5,iPad Pro 9.7 10.5 11 12.9, iPad Air 2 3 4, Galaxy tabs, Switch, Fire HD tab , iPhone 13 /pro Max /Pro/X/11 10 8 7 6 , Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1″ 10.5″ 9.7″ 9.6″ 8″, Kindle Fire HD 7 8 10 , ect. In addition, the tablet phone is equipped with silicone pads, which will protect your device from scratch and damage.
【Reinforced Bolt Clamp Base】Reinforced and thickened base, not easy to break. Non-slip silicone pads are added to the base clip to avoid damage to your furniture. The base has a maximum clamp size of 3.7 inches, maximizing usability. Whether you’re laying in bed watching movie, viewing recipes in the kitchen,exercising in the gym, or using your devices anywhere, you don’t have to worry about falling and breaking it.
【Easy to Mount & Position】 This gooseneck clamp can be mount to many places like bed headboard, desk or table next to your favorite chair. With 360 degree rotate clip and flexble arm, It can be adjusted to your eye level or any other height you want. Free your hands when watching movies, playing games, reading, viewing recipes, recording videos, etc.
【Using Tips】1. Please loop the long arm into “S or Z “shape or circle shape helps maintain more stability . 2. The material of the holder is stronger for the heavy tablet, it will be a litte hard to bend, so please use your both hands to bend the holder when you start to use it. 3. This type of gooseneck tablet holder is perfect for reading,viewing,or recording. But when you tap on your tablet frequently , it unavoidably bounces and wobbles due to some law of physics.
